course_title: Spec Projects:Danc & Movemnt Stud: Dance Lab
class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Students will deepen their practice as dancers through conditioning (cardio, cross-training, weights, Pilates, advanced stretching) and movement techniques (intermediate ballet exercises, specialized days focusing on jumps and turns). In addition, the course covers dance-specific body care, such as injury prevention and nutrition. Students must also be enrolled in a dance technique course. Contact Mara Mandradjieff Bennett at mara.p.mandradjieff@emory.edu for a permission number.
course_description: Provides students with an opportunity to explore individually designed projects under faculty supervision and evaluation. May be repeated for credit when project varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 5726, Section #: 2, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10-11:15a, Instructor: M. Mandradjieff, Status: Open
